task.title: Operating Vehicle Foot Pedals
task.shortdesc: Learn the specific functions and operational mechanics of three foot pedals in a vintage vehicle control system.

context.p: Understanding the precise operation of foot pedals is crucial for controlling early mechanical vehicles. Each pedal has a distinct function that affects vehicle speed, direction, and braking.

info.p: The clutch pedal has three primary positions:

ul.li: Fully depressed position engages low speed
Half-way depressed position places the clutch in neutral In neutral, the clutch is disconnected from the driving mechanism of the rear wheels
Released position engages the high-speed clutch
